prefs-notifications: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:Preferences}} Special:Preferences], headline for notify me section in preferences.
notifyme-subscriber-provider-preferences: Description for preferences related to subscribers in the notification system.
notifyme-link-label-view-page: Label for a link that directs users to view a specific page.

notifyme-digest-header-weekly: Header for weekly notification digest emails.

notifyme-digest-subject-weekly: Subject line for weekly digest notifications.
notifyme-bucket-content-low-freq-label: Label for less frequency content radio selection button
notifyme-bucket-content-high-freq-label: Label for high frequency content radio selection button

notifyme-channel-email: Label for the email notification channel.
notifyme-channel-web: Label for the web notification channel.

notifyme-ui-dialog-set-editor-type: Field for selecting the type of editor.

Label indicating prefixed channels in the editor settings.

notifyme-ui-dialog-set-editor-create: Label for the create action in the editor dialog.
notifyme-sample-data-agent:
Sample data key for the notification agent.

If there is a default placeholder name in your language, translate this as that. Otherwise you might translate something like "Example person".

notifyme-sample-data-message: Sample data key for the message content of notifications.

notifyme-sample-data-link-2: Sample data key for the second notification link.

notifyme-sample-data-source-provider-2: Sample data key for the second source provider of notifications.
notifyme-sample-data-message-group: Sample data key for grouping notification messages.
notifyme-sample-data-content: Sample data key for the content of notifications.

notifyme-edit-mail-template-error-edit: Error message for editing a mail template.
notificationcenter: Label for the notification center interface.
notifyme-ui-subscription-set-empty: Message indicating that the subscription set is empty.

notifyme-sample-data-links-intro: Introduction text for sample data links.

notifyme-event-page-create:
Action indicating a page has been created.
$1 - gender
$2 - page title
notifyme-event-page-create-bot:
Action indicating a bot has created a page.
$1 - page title
notifyme-link-label-history: Label for a link that directs users to view the history of notifications.
notifyme-event-page-edit:
Action indicating a page has been edited.
$1 - gender
$2 - page title
notifyme-event-page-edit-bot:
Action indicating a bot is involved in a page event.
$1 - page title
notifyme-event-page-edit-group:
Action indicating editing of a page related to a group.
* $1 - page title
* $2 - amount of edits
notifyme-links-intro-edit: Introduction text for editing links in notifications.
notifyme-event-page-move-bot:
Action indicating a bot has moved a page.
* $1 - page title
* $2 - new title
notifyme-event-page-delete-bot:
Action indicating a bot has deleted a page.
$1 - page title
notifyme-event-page-move:
Action indicating a page has been moved.
* $1 - gender
* $2 - page title from
* $3 - page title to
notifyme-event-page-delete:
Action indicating a page has been deleted.
$1 - gender
$2 - page title
notifyme-mail-manage-notifications: Label for managing notification settings in mail.
notifyme-mail-manage-notifications-link: Link to manage notification settings in mail.
notifyme-notification-center-filter-labe: Notification Center filter label (in case of empty filter)
Notification Center filter label (in case of empty filter)
notifyme-event-page-linked-key-desc: Description indicating a page is linked to another event.
notifyme-event-page-linked:
Action indicating a page is linked to an event.
$1 - gender
$2 - page title from
$3 - page title to
notifyme-event-page-linked-bot:
Action indicating a bot has linked a page to an event.
* $1 - page title from
* $2 - page title to
notifyme-event-page-linked-group:
Action indicating a group page is linked to an event.
$1 - page title from
$2 - page title to
$3 - count
notifyme-event-user-group-added-key-desc: Description for an event where a user group has been added.

Action indicating a group has been assigned to an event.

$2 - plural of group
$3 - group names

Action indicating a bot has assigned a group to an event.

$2 - plural of group

Action indicating a group has been removed from an event.

$2 - plural of group
$3 - group names

Action indicating a bot has removed a group from an event.
$1 - plural of group
$3 - group names

notifyme-notification-tester-invalid-tar: Error message indicating an invalid target user in the notification tester.
notifyme-notification-generic-links-intr: Introduction text for generic links in notifications.

notifyme-ui-delete: Label for the delete action in the UI.
notifyme-ui-delivery-web-email: Label indicating delivery options for web and email notifications.
notifyme-ui-delivery-web: Label indicating delivery options for web notifications.
notifyme-notification-tester-event-info: Information about the event being tested in the notification tester.
notifyme-notifications-mega-menu-no-noti: Label which is displayed when there are no new notifications

notifyme-navbar-button-aria-label: Aria label for notifications mega menu button

notifyme-notification-center-tab-label-u: Label for the unread notifications tab in the notification center.
notifyme-notification-center-tab-label-r:
Label for the read notifications tab in the notification center.

Note: this is the perfect participle, as in "has been read".
notifyme-notification-center-tab-label-a: Label for the all notifications tab in the notification center.
notifyme-notifications-group-mark-group-: Label for marking a notification group as unread.

Label indicating that a notification group is expanded.

Label indicating that a notification group is collapsed.

notifyme-notification-center-mark-as-rea: Title for the mark as read action in the notification center.
notifyme-notification-center-mark-as-unr: Title for the mark as unread action in the notification center.

notifyme-notification-center-no-new-noti: Label indicating there are no new notifications.
